description.en:
What is Pepe AI Token(PepeAI)?

Launched in 8/5/2023 by a team based in United States of America, Pepe AI is a fully decentralized, self-managed wallet protocol that grants its holders the ability to easily and securely interact with their tokens, all supported by superior risk analysis and smart contract management tools. To participate in Pepe AI staking, all you need to do is stake $PepeAI tokens on our linked crypto wallet. Then, send the tokens to a staking contract and lock them for a certain period. Once the staking platform locks the $PepeAI tokens, you start earning rewards. It's that easy!
